column2: A new character will be granted the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! and be our new vassal.
Stop pillaging every holding in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!
Grant the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! to the clan with the least nomadic land.
Select the colour from which the new kingdom colour will base itself.
New Realm: Select Coat of Arms
Select the title coat of arms for the new kingdom coat of arms.
Select the title name or adjective for the first and third options in selecting the kingdom name.\nThe selected adjective is §Y[Root.GetAdjective]§!.
